# Modal Panel Return Values

**API Collection**

These constants define the possible return values for such methods as the `runModal...` methods of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenPanel] class, which tell which button (OK or Cancel) the user has clicked on an open panel.

## Constants

- **NSCancelButton**: The Cancel button
- **NSOKButton**: The OK button

## Constants

- **Alert Panel Return Values**: These constants define values returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRunAlertPanel] function and by the `NSApplication` method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)] when the modal session is run with an `NSPanel` provided by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGetAlertPanel] function.
- **Style Masks**: Constants that specify panel styles.
